description:
From our law office in Charlotte, North Carolina, the dedicated legal professionals at the Lanier Law Group P.A. provide outstanding representation and support to individuals and families throughout Mecklenburg County and the surrounding areas who suffered an injury or lost a loved one as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

Established in 1997, we have grown to become one of our state's most prominent and successful personal injury practices, with 11 law offices throughout North Carolina to serve those suffering needlessly through no fault of their own. Over the past 23 years, we have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for our plaintiff clients adversely affected by motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice, sexual assault, defective products and other preventable tragedies. We have also assisted many clients with obtaining their rightful workers' compensation and Social Security Disability benefits.

As further evidence of our success, our attorneys have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers, including designations as Top 100 Trial Lawyers from The National Trial Lawyers and America's Top 100 High Stakes Litigators. We have also received many positive testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients who have offered praise about our superior level of client service.

In order to increase the likelihood you will obtain the full amount of finances you need during this uncertain time in your life, you need a heavyweight who will stand in your corner and fight hard for you until the end. To begin the process, you can contact the Lanier Law Group P.A. and schedule a free evaluation of your claim. In an effort to help keep you and your loved ones safe, we also offer virtual consultations so you don't have to risk your health and safety to speak with us.
